items.title: Move more for heart health: why 150 minutes of physical activity per week matters
items.description: Learn why 150 minutes of weekly movement lowers heart disease risk, improves blood pressure and energy, and supports long‑term cardiovascular health

items.title: GLP-1 medications for heart health: why cardiologists see them as more than a weight loss drug
items.description: Learn how these drugs may lower heart attack and stroke risk, reduce inflammation, target visceral fat, and support early cardiovascular prevention

items.title: Winterize your vehicle: The emergency kit checklist every driver needs
items.description: Learn how to winterize your vehicle with a comprehensive emergency kit checklist.

items.title: Navigating scanxiety: Finding calm during breast cancer screening and treatment
items.description: Learn how to manage scanxiety — the stress and uncertainty around breast cancer screenings and results. Discover expert tips, calming strategies, and emotional support resources to help you feel more in control.

items.title: The hidden cost of chronic pain: What it steals and how to take it back
items.description: Discover how our whole-person approach and virtual care options help you reclaim your strength, confidence and quality of life

items.title: Genetic testing is eye-opening for Montana family with a history of cancer
items.description: Discover how one woman’s routine checkup led to a life-saving diagnosis of Lynch syndrome.

items.title: Behind the Bloodwork: Learn what routine labs can uncover
items.description: Discover how blood tests can uncover hidden health issues early and guide smarter care decisions—even when you feel fine

items.title: Breast cancer survivor finds quality care close to home
items.description: Julie Scholes had it all—love, health, and a job she adored. But in spring 2023, a post-workout chest pain and lump changed everything.
